name: Synthesis Question Formulation
core_question: What exactly are we synthesizing and why?

name: Level-of-Analysis Selection
core_question: At what abstraction level?

name: Source Landscape Mapping
core_question: What types of knowledge exist and are missing?

name: Systematic Source Collection
core_question: Have we gathered comprehensively?

name: Source Quality Assessment
core_question: How reliable is each source?

name: Diversity Verification
core_question: Are multiple perspectives represented?

name: Tacit Knowledge Elicitation
core_question: What knowledge is undocumented?

name: Counter-Source Search
core_question: Have we sought disagreement?

name: Atomic Claim Extraction
core_question: What exactly does each source claim?

name: Concept Taxonomy Building
core_question: Are we using consistent terminology?

name: Model Inventory
core_question: What frameworks do sources use?

name: Evidence Grading
core_question: How strong is the evidence?

name: Assumption Surfacing
core_question: What's implicit in each source?

name: Knowledge Gap Identification
core_question: What's missing from the source set?

name: Convergence-Divergence Mapping
core_question: Where do sources agree and disagree?

name: Dialectical Tension Mapping
core_question: What thesis-antithesis pairs exist?

name: Analogical Structure Mapping
core_question: What structural parallels exist cross-domain?

name: Conceptual Blend Construction
core_question: What emerges when we blend mental spaces?

name: Causal Chain Reconciliation
core_question: How do different causal explanations fit together?

name: Pattern Detection Across Sources
core_question: What recurring patterns span sources?

name: Level Alignment Check
core_question: Are we mixing abstraction levels correctly?

name: Gap Significance Analysis
core_question: Are gaps random or systematic?

name: Dialectical Integration
core_question: How do we resolve productive tensions?

name: Framework Unification
core_question: Can we build one framework from many?

name: Emergence Detection
core_question: What's genuinely new in the combination?

name: Abductive Integration
core_question: What's the best explanation for all evidence?

name: Knowledge Compression
core_question: What's the shortest description that captures the essential?

name: Boundary Condition Mapping
core_question: Where does this synthesis apply and where not?

name: Synthesis Coherence Check
core_question: Is the synthesis internally consistent?

name: Core Insight Distillation
core_question: What are the 3-7 most important findings?

name: Mental Model Design
core_question: What model captures this for intuitive use?

name: Principle Extraction
core_question: What general rules emerge?

name: Narrative Construction
core_question: What's the story?

name: Actionability Assessment
core_question: What should change based on this?

name: Apophenia Check
core_question: Are detected patterns real?

name: Confirmation Bias Audit
core_question: Did prior views distort the synthesis?

name: Completeness Assessment
core_question: Is the synthesis adequate?

name: Falsifiability Check
core_question: Can the synthesis be proven wrong?

name: Source Bias Propagation Check
core_question: Did source biases infect the synthesis?

name: Novel Information Test
core_question: Is this genuine synthesis or just summary?

name: Synthesis Decay Monitoring
core_question: When will this synthesis expire?
